column3: Rafold hopes to turn a curse into a cure.
Rafold has asked you to harvest a grenade claw. Lie in ambush at Dalamud's Talons for a grenade, and slay the creature for its appendage.
You have obtained a grenade claw. Deliver it to Memezofu at the Ceruleum Processing Plant.
Memezofu is thankful for your delivery, as he had just exhausted his supply of grenade claws.
Lurk at the specified location and slay a grenade for its claw.
Deliver the grenade claw to Memezofu.
Danger lurks near Dalamud's Talons, as the winds whisper the presence of grenades.
No petty pest to purge, but the price of pain pays a prize─grenade claws.
While I'm unfamiliar with the reagent's exact medicinal effect, I do know it serves to pacify my alchemist; an effect alone I deem invaluable.
And we will certainly need salves in the days ahead. When you have slain the grenade and collected its claw, I would ask that you deliver it to Memezofu directly.
No, no, no... I'm afraid this won't do at all. How is one to perform alchemy without reagents? I cannot simply make something out of nothing!
Ah, yes, a grenade claw, and just when I'd run out! Good to know my pleas to Rafold were not entirely in vain.
I shall tend to the task of formulating potions at once. On behalf of the several lives you've saved bringing me this, I thank you.
